question: What does Section 2 cover in the Joint Accounts Policy
answer: Section 2 of the Joint Accounts Policy covers the scope of the policy, which applies to all joint accounts held by two or more individuals at Amanah Bank, including savings accounts, current accounts, and fixed deposits. It also covers joint accounts operated under different modes such as "either or survivor," "former or survivor," "jointly," or "anyone or survivor."
